properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 2:46AM CST until January 8 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
...COLDER WEST WINDS ARRIVE LATER TODAY INTO TONIGHT...

* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with gale gusts up to 35 kt and
waves 6 to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight CST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT
